en.title: How do you want to proceed?
en.options: As your {{ case.divorceWho }} hasn't admitted the adultery, you need to choose whether to continue using this reason for divorce.
en.onlyDoThis: The court will make a judgement on the information and evidence available. If you have further any evidence you'll be able to upload it later in this application.
en.evidence: Evidence can include messages (eg letters, text messages, emails), photos, or an admission of the adultery from the person your {{ case.divorceWho }} committed adultery with.
